author: kfogel
msg: Remove all dependency on the bindings:
* tools/cvs2svn/cvs2svn.py: Stop importing from `svn'.
(make_path): Removed.
(format_date): New function.
(Commit.get_metadata): Don't take a pool, just call format_date
instead of depending on the util.* date stuff.
(Commit.commit): Don't create or use any pools.
(convert): Don't take a pool, and don't set it in the ctx.
(main): Just call convert directly, don't use util.run_app.

author: sussman
msg: Begin work on issue #891: "REPORT fails if item missing in HEAD."
Some libsvn_ra_dav code reorg:  new-style update-report requests will
be run against the VCC, so make it easy to get a VCC.
* libsvn_ra_dav/props.c (search_for_starting_props): new factorized
helper function; searches up the parent dirs of a public URL for
starting props.
(svn_ra_dav__get_baseline_props):  use the helper function.
(svn_ra_dav__get_vcc): new utility function, also uses helper function.
* libsvn_ra_dav/ra_dav.h (svn_ra_dav__get_vcc):  declare.

author: kfogel
msg: Get rid of the in-memory Node trees, do head tree reflection on disk
instead.  Also, don't use leading "/" on Subversion repository paths.
* tools/cvs2svn/cvs2svn.py: Import shutil, for rmtree.
(main): Remove leading "/" from initializations of trunk_base,
branches_base, and tags_base.
(branch_path): Add a comment about how calculation of branch path
will need to conform to the modern recommended layout.
(ensure_directories): Use an on-disk tree now, not a Node tree.
(Node, NodeError): Remove these classes, we're doing this with an
on-disk tree now.
(Dump.__init__): Create a tmpdir, and an svnroot dir inside it.
(Dump.add_or_change_path): Use the disk tree, not a Node tree.
(Dump.close): Recursively remove the tmpdir.

author: philip
msg: Fix issue 1031, avoid the signed/unsigned warnings produced by
the upcoming gcc 3.3.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/error.c (svn_strerror): Add an explicit cast.
* subversion/tests/libsvn_delta/delta-window-test.h (delta_window_print): Use
a signed rather than an unsigned variable.
* subversion/tests/libsvn_delta/random-test.c (generate_random_file): Add
an explicit cast.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_svn/marshal.c
(writebuf_push, readbuf_drain): Use signed rather than unsigned variables.
(writebuf_write, readbuf_read): Add an explicit cast.

author: kfogel
msg: Fix up the format of Revision entries in the dumpfile.
Patch by: Michael Wood <mwood@its.uct.ac.za>
(Cosmetic tweaks by me.)
* branches/cvs2svn-kfogel/tools/cvs2svn/cvs2svn.py:
(Dump.start_revision): Fix the Prop-content-length and
Content-length calculation.  Move the code that outputs
"PROPS-END" out of the loop.
